participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, Emma values her quiet time and loves exploring nature.
participant_1.background: I'm looking for a cozy, quiet home with plenty of space for my dog and me. I love learning about animals and nature, but my cooking skills are lacking. I hate talking to people. I am passionate about my family. I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and determined, Jake believes in the power of hard work and enjoys uplifting music.
participant_2.background: I have been struggling with my mental health recently. I think if I work hard enough I can fix the world. I especially enjoy listening to the band The Lumineers. My position is linebacker. I like listening to music that helps me feel more confident and comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out. I've been listening to a lot of music lately.
Cool, what kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I've been really into The Lumineers lately.
I've heard of them, but I haven't listened to them much. What do you like about them?
I like their lyrics and their sound. They're really talented musicians.
I'll have to check them out. What other music do you like?
I like a lot of indie rock, folk music, and alternative music.
Cool, I like a lot of those genres too.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm a big fan of indie rock and folk music.
Awesome! I love discovering new music.
Me too. It's so much fun to find new bands and artists that you love.
